name: Xmas Failure
description:
Survive through Santa Claus's hard but simple life.

You play as a little bit younger Santa Claus when he was starting his career but that was a long time ago as he lives long time. You have only one meaning for your life and that is to get presents for delivery on Christmas. There are some other problems that comes with it, though.

All you need is a mouse (and working left and right buttons). There's also a tutorial (image) in game that explains what the buttons do and other important features of the game.

The results of a game jam called "Extra Credits Holiday 2018". This was made by me alone and I used a game engine Unity with C#. I used one asset which is event manager I've made for other games of mine. Other assets are images for landscapes.

There was four days time to submit a game due to rules of jam.

Have fun and comments are always welcomed!
